description: This file defines a Pinia store for authentication in a Vue.js frontend application, managing user state, login, registration, token storage, and API interactions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads authentication data from local storage and updates store state accordingly.

methods.name: function save() { save
methods.description: Saves current user and token data to local storage, or removes it if no token.

methods.name: async function login({ username, password }: { username: string; password: string }) { login
methods.description: Performs login by sending credentials to API, updates store state, and sets auth token.

methods.name: async function register({ username, password }: { username: string; password: string }) { register
methods.description: Handles user registration via API call.

methods.name: function logout() { logout
methods.description: Clears user data and token from store and local storage, and resets API token.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^  async function login({ username, password }: { username: string; password: string }) {$/

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^  async function register({ username, password }: { username: string; password: string }) {$/

ctags.name: resp
ctags.pattern: /^    const resp = await api.post('\/auth\/login', { username, password }) as { token: string, use/
